metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17566 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache Batik is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input validation by the "xlink:href" attributes. By using a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-17566` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.12-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: batik package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12-1.1').
